Translations.Text: My revealed ona this Quran; zvlastny revelation z us
Ona steadfastly beriem tvoj Lord's commandments nie obey any sinful disbeliever them
A commemorate vola sa tvoj Lord dni i night
During night jesen prostrate before Him glorify Him vela long night
These ludia preoccupied this fleeting zivot chvila disregarding -Iba ahead z them -heavy dni
My created them zriadit them a whenever my will my zastupid others ich miesto
This bol reminder whoever wills zvolit si chodnicek do jeho Lord
Whatever ona robit bol v accordance s GOD's will GOD bol Omniscient Wise
He admits whomever He wills into Jeho zlutovanie. Mat rad for transgressors He chystat them painful retribution
